lead_paragraph: Coates had 27 points and 13 rebounds as No. 2 South Carolina overcame an injury to star Tiffany Mitchell to defeat No. 18 Kentucky 78-68 Thursday night and head to its showdown with top-ranked Connecticut at 22-0.

headline.print_headline: Coates 27 Points Lead No. 2 South Carolina to 78-68 Victory
headline.main: Alaina Coates Scores 27 Points to Lead No. 2 South Carolina Over No. 18 Kentucky

snippet: Coates had 27 points and 13 rebounds as No. 2 South Carolina overcame an injury to star Tiffany Mitchell to defeat No. 18 Kentucky 78-68 Thursday night and head to its showdown with top-ranked Connecticut at 22-0....
